column3: This course will introduce you to the fundamentals of programming in Python. You will learn how to build simple applications as well as learn the fundamentals of programming from a computer science perspective
column6: This course will introduce you to the fundamentals of programming in Python.
column7: For this course, it is recommended to have a basic understanding of computers. You will also need a Windows, MacOSX or Linux computer.

column2: Introduction to Data Structures with Python
column3: This course will introduce you to the basics of data structures using the Python programming language. You will learn how to implement a stack, queue, linked list, and BST
column6: This course will introduce you to the fundamentals of data structures in Python
column7: For this course, it is recommended to have a fundamental understanding of programming, preferrably in Python. Consider completing the introduction to programming in Python course before this course

column3: This course introduces the foundations of mathematics for computer scientists. Topics include sums, recurrence, number theory, probability and asymptotic methods
column6: This course introduces the foundations of math for computer science
column7: For this course, it is recommended to have a foundational understanding of mathematics, including basic arithmetic and functions

column3: This course will teach you the foundational ideas of object oriented programming using Java as a programming language. You will learn about inheritence, abstraction and other important OOP concepts
column6: This course introduces the foundations of object oriented programming
column7: For this course, it is recommended to have a foundational understanding of programming with any language.
